title: Exploring Mobile Development
excerpt: Starting to look at mobile development alongside website development, comparing app development to mobile website interfaces, and considering using frameworks like Flutter.
author: Codem
content:
Venturing into Mobile Development

Starting to look at mobile development alongside website development.

Development on mobile apps can look extremely different compared to the mobile interface of a website. This is very important to take into account when designing applications rather than websites.

Current Focus: Flutter

I now am attempting to get started with something like flutter in order to produce development for mobiles as well rather than just mobile interface.

I might be attempting to make one further down the line commercially rather than on a personal project basis as its an important piece of the package that comes along with software development.

I'll start of with weighing the pros and cons between manually coding or template wise development via other tools. You can check out my portfolio to see my web projects so far.
